then here

Megaton stopped about twenty feet away from Iron Raptor. His towering form
placed her in his shadow. The dragon took a good close look at the bot who
appeared to be in charge. Her look had changed since the predacon files he'd
studied but there was no mistaking that the bot standing tall before him was
none other than Iron Raptor.

Transforming to his freakish robot mode Megaton shrunk down to a size more
compatible with hers. He still stood slightly taller than her but they were
now equals none the less. "My name, my dear, is Megaton, rank will be leader
of all predacons." He stepped back a step to appear less menacing. "As you
may already know the Predacons are split into seperate factions making my
opposition ripe targets. Destroy the other leaders and the Predacons will be
reunited." He knew that the information he was giving the maximals didn't
sound very convincing but there was a twist that he'd left out. "I know that
you've recently taken quite a bit of damage from attacks, I offer the
protection of my faction in return for your assistance." As added incentive
he added, "If a single bot such as myself walked up to your front door
imagine what a group with a dozen warriors could do."
----- Original Message -----
From: Megan Solmonson <tmrattrap@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, March 20, 2001 4:49 PM
Subject: Proving Ground.


>
> Yan says I should post more. I'll try.
>
> * Iron Raptor looked around at the Maximals which had gathered around this
> new transformer, eyeing him in turn and then not removing her eyes from
his
> form.
> Who was this guy and what did he want?
> Well, just like he had caught her attaneion, seconds later it seemed like
> she had caught his as well. But, she didn't move from where she stood.
> Crossing her arms, she stayed right there as the new transformer
approached
> her, not budging and keeping her eyes locked on him.
> < Who is he?> she asked Prowl.
> She didn't recognize this bot as anyone she had seen before.*
>
